data.title: Robert J. Black, his life and life's work. Author inscribed. by Irwin, A.: Very Good Hardcover (1901) 1st Edition, Inscribed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Inscribed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - 1st ed. "Derry Standard" Office Londonderry - 1901 - Condition: Very Good - Crown8vo, portrait frontispiece, ix, 165 p. Illustrated. Original royal blue cloth, elaborate gilt, all edges gilt. The fore-edge of both boards are lightly damp marked otherwise near fine contents with the unusual printed 'thank you' presentation sheet pasted to the front pastedown with the dedicatee in ink and signed in ink by Irwin. Scarce, WorldCat locates only four copies. First edition. Light book. Postage will be reduced on processing the order. - Robert J. Black, his life and life's work. Author inscribed.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

All books are first editions, in publisher's original binding or wrappers unless

otherwise stated. All items as described except for prior owners bookplates or

signatures or clipped price on dust jackets and can be returned within 14 days,

though please advise us before returning. All items subject to prior sale.

Postage extra at cost. Book insurance is extra. We can accept International

Money Orders, PayPal and personal Cheques drawn in sterling. Please request tracking details at extra charge....

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 Lb, (1 KG). If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required, however if it is lighter be assured we WILL reduce the postage charged on processing your order.

Additional services such as tracking, signed for, courier delivery, etc. are of course possible on request and will be charged at cost.
